entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
